location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter to John Beaumont and George Green, Factors at Bushire from William Digges LaTouche and George Abraham at Bussora (Basra)

mods.abstract: The letter states that if no Cruizer arrives, Shaikh Nassir would be able to send his gallivat to evacuate LaTouche and Abraham to Bushire. Letter also that states a letter to the Vakeel (referring to Karim Khan) is enclosed (it is not contained in the file) and requests for the letter to be translated into Persian and be delivered by Bushire's linguist. Shipped by Hamdan Carack boat.
